bossDialog: Even if I lose here, I'll get you eventually. You can count on that.
It's a sad thing that your adventures have ended here!
To struggle against me is to struggle against the inevitable.

cardBonuses.2: Your creatures have a 10% greater chance to deal critical damage.
cardBonuses.5: Your creatures deal 25% more critical damage.
cardBonuses.8: Your creatures have a minimum 10% chance to deal critical damage.

master.dialog: Reapers can make quick work of just about any creature out there. They care little for an enemy's defenses - if their opponent starts to lose focus, Reapers will end them in the blink of an eye. Let's fight!
master.name: Brindrid

name: Reaper
